title: Raw Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, European
description: Restaurant with juice bar operating since spring 2011. Menu is approximately 50% raw food and 50% cooked vegan food. Has fresh juices, smoothies, and wheatgrass shots along with desserts cakes and sweets. Honey is used at times and also for sale. This is the first of 2 outlets in the city.
